The Machinetalk RPC Protocol provides a realiable RPC interface for Machinetalk. It is designed with as RESTful interface.
Ping from client to service. The PING message is used in the client to check if a remote service is still present. Furthermore, some type of connections require a transfer every once in while to be kept alive by the operating system.
Service response to ping from client.
Description of RPC components.
